data.name: Tale Of A Wolf
data.detailed_description:
EXPERIENCE THE LIFE OF A WOLF
You take control of a young wolf named Ako. Born on the island of Sylvanna, you have learned the ways of the world from your father.  However, there is still much to learn.  Ako, a naive canine, discovers this abruptly as he meets mankind for the first time and sees their wicked ways for himself.  You will have to survive the wildlands and reclaim the island to restore the natural balance of the diverse ecosystem on Sylvanna.

THE STORY IS YOURS TO TELL
The time of tranquility is over, man has landed on the shores and they are setting up camps all over the island. Extracting valuable resources from the earth and destroying natural habitats wherever they go. You can decide to stalk your human prey and take them down silently one by one, use the power of fire to burn down the encampments sprawled across the land or infuse essence into your body & soul to become an elemental wolf!

REALISTIC ENVIRONMENT
Tale Of A Wolf features a variety of realistic mechanics!
  • Day & night system with full seasonal weather.
  • Wild animals roam the land freely - Deers, Bears, Toads, Hedgehogs, Crab, Rabbit, Fox.
  • Open world area to explore!
  • Wild wolf packs that you can either work with or against!
  • Extensive cave system, extending the playable area.
  • Fast travel portal system.
  • Use elemental forces to transform and eliminate your enemies!

GET READY FOR A NEW ADVENTURE
Will the humans takeover Sylvanna?

Will the native wildlife survive the expansion of mankind?

Can you defeat the elementals that lurk in the mountains?

Guide Ako on his journey of discovery and make unconventional friendships along the way!

data.short_description: Tale Of A Wolf is a story driven, open world wolf adventure, that puts the fate of Sylvanna in your hands.Join forces with nature and expel man!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1060 - 4GB.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intergrated Audio Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 - 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated Audio Card

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
